description:
Once you've paid your dues for the views, this down jacket hugs you with warmth as you add your name to the summit log or fold up your skins and get ready for the run down. Made with eco-friendly materuials, the AlpLight Down Jacket gives you that warm, fuzzy feeling ('cause you're staying warm and doing your part for the planet). Wind and water-resistant NetPlus® fabric has you covered if the weather turns, and it all packs away into its own pocket for convenient storage.

  • 10-denier NetPlus® fabric is ultralight, packable nylon ripstop that’s made from recycled fishing nets
  • PFC-free DWR sheds moisture and maintains the fabric's breathability
  • Insulated with high-lofting, premium 800-fill-power goose down
  • Full-length, lightweight Vislon zipper with interior storm flap
  • 2 zippered handwarmer pockets
  • Right pocket doubles as the jacket's stuff sack
  • Nylon-bound elastic cuffs keep the cold away from wrists
  • Drawcord hem seals out drafts
name: Patagonia AlpLight Down Jacket - Women's
